dji.sdk.api.GroundStation

Class DJIGroundStationMissionPushInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.GroundStation.DJIGroundStationMissionPushInfo

  • public class DJIGroundStationMissionPushInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Ground Station Mission Push Info Class

    This structure is designed for holding the information of navigation mission executing status. It will be used in the interface of DJIGroundStationMissionPushInfoCallBack( DJIGroundStationMissionPushInfo). This interface will be called while the push information has been received by the SDK. Developer could use this to design a status notification bar for customers.
    Version:
    V2.3.0
    Author:
    DJI Software

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int currState
      0 - Initialization
      1 - Moving
      2 - Rotating
      3 - In action
      4 - Reached way point and before action
      5 - Reached way point and after action
      int errorNotification
      The error notification is used for giving the error status for navigation mission.
      int followMeDistance
      The distance about aircraft and mobile phone(unit : cm)
      int followMeGpsLevel
      0 Total not gps signal
      1 Gps signal very weak
      2 Gps signal for go home
      3 Gps signal for hovering
      4 Gps signal for record home point
      5 Gps signal very strong
      int followMeMissionStatus
      0 Follow me init
      1 Follow me moving
      2 Follow me waiting
      int followMeReason
      The reason of follow me
      int hotPointMissionStatus
      0 Hotpoint init
      1 Hotpoint moving
      2 Hotpoint waiting
      int hotPointRadius
      distance to hot point(unit : cm)
      int hotPointReason
      The reason of hot point
      DJIGroundStationTypeDef.GroundStationStatusPushType missionType
      4 kinds of mission type:
      0x00 - Attitude
      0x01 - Way Point Mission
      0x02 - Hot Point
      0x03 - Follow Me
      int reserved
      This is an attribute for reserving propose.
      int targetWayPointIndex
      Next Way Point index
